name: BUZZ! Junior: RoboJam
description:
Blast off to a whole new galaxy of fun! BUZZ!™ Junior: RoboJam takes you to a futuristic world where mischievous robots are sent to Robot Boot camp. Now for the PLAYSTATION®3 system, BUZZ!™ Junior: RoboJam provides 4-way mischievous action. So what are you waiting for? Join in the mechanical mayhem.
-Compatible with BUZZ!™ buzzers or PLAYSTATION®3 system controllers
-Fun and accessible to all ages!
-Play through 5 simple and hilarious mini-games
-Up to 4-player robotic mayhem
BUZZ!™ Junior: RoboJam ©2007-2009 Sony Computer Entertainment Europe. Published by Sony Computer Entertainment Europe, Developed by Cohort Studios Ltd. BUZZ! and the BUZZ! logo are trademarks of Sony Computer Entertainment Europe. All rights reserved.
